name: Drumpfy Walls
description: Jump into an alternate reality where two great countries, Mer'ca and Mer'xico are politically and literally fighting over a border wall. Play as members of two groups, the "Reds" and the "Blues" as they face off each other in a battle over immigration and future votes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB+ Direct 9 GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 15 MB available space Sound Card: Sound Blaster
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 4GB+ Direct 9 GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 15 MB available space Sound Card: Sound Blaster
